tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE participants (
  participant_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  participant_name VARCHAR(50),
  participant_age INT,
  participant_gender VARCHAR(10),
  participant_city VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE Performances (
  performance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  participant_id INT,
  performance_type VARCHAR(50),
  performance_score FLOAT,
  FOREIGN KEY (participant_id) REFERENCES Participants(participant_id)
);

CREATE TABLE performances (
    performance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    participant_id INT,
    performance_date DATE,
    performance_song VARCHAR,
    performance_duration INT
);

CREATE TABLE participants (
  participant_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  participant_name VARCHAR NOT NULL,
  participant_age INT,
  participant_gender VARCHAR,
  participant_email VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE performances (
  performance_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  participant_id INT,
  performance_name VARCHAR NOT NULL,
  performance_date DATE,
  performance_score FLOAT,
  FOREIGN KEY (participant_id) REFERENCES participants(participant_id)
);

CREATE TABLE scores (
  score_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  performance_id INT,
  judge_id INT,
  score FLOAT,
  FOREIGN KEY (performance_id) REFERENCES performances(performance_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (judge_id) REFERENCES judges(judge_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Performances (
    performance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    singer_id INT REFERENCES Singers(singer_id),
    performance_title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    performance_date DATE,
    judges_score DECIMAL(5,2),
    feedback TEXT
);
